doc.title: Hypnerotomachia Nausika: Nausika's Struggle for Love in a Dream
doc.plot: Nausika, Amazon fighter and leader of a tribe of nomadic devotees on Lesbos has lost all of her protectors, suitors and her castle and has put her in exile. Life has finally caught up with Nausika who is brought down by the Fates (Moirae) - the seed planters, cloth spinners and cutters of life.
